about_the_game:
About the Game

This is a Roguelike tower defense game. Enemies will come from all directions. Through your wisdom, you can freely choose which enemies to challenge, place towers, select rewards, and protect your crystal. Ultimately, you need to withstand the surging and increasingly powerful army.

Game Features

  Freely Choose Enemies!!!

        In this game, you can freely choose which enemies to challenge next. The enemies will become stronger and stronger as they wait. In particular, you can challenge the final boss at any time, as long as you think you are ready!

  Purchase Props to Strengthen Yourself!!!

        After defeating enemies and obtaining gold coins, you can purchase props with unique features, population, or defense towers in the shop to strengthen yourself.

  Intense Battles!!!

        Get ready to challenge more and more enemies and face increasingly intense battles!

Join Us!!!

Discord  

If you have any questions or suggestions, please join our Discord to communicate directly with the developers!!!
